#summary sum(property[distinct,where,include])
#labels api,0.8,model,class

*Description*:

Calculates the sum of values on a given column.

*Return Type*:

Numeric

*

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *property* || string || true ||  || Name of the property to get the sum for (has to be a property of a numeric data type). ||
|| *distinct* || boolean || false || false || When true SUM returns the sum of unique values only. ||
|| *where* || string || false ||  || A SQL fragment such as lastName LIKE 'A%' for example. ||
|| *include* || string || false ||  || Any associations that needs to be included in the query. ||



*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset allSalaries = model("Employee").sum(property="salary")>
}}}

{{{
<cfset allSalaries = model("Employee").sum(property="salary", include="country", where="name='Australia'")>

}}}
